articles.title: A second US congressional delegation visits Taiwan
articles.description: A US congressional delegation led by Massachusetts Democratic Sen. Ed Markey has arrived in Taipei on an unannounced two-day visit, the second US congressional delegation to Taiwan this month.

articles.author: Andrew E. Kramer
articles.title: Shelling Kills One in Ukrainian Town Near Nuclear Site Amid Accelerating Exodus
articles.description: A foreman at the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power complex died after a shell struck his home, officials said. More than 1,000 cars were lined up in the area, seeking to exit Russian-controlled territory, witnesses said.
articles.content:
The Zaporizhzhia nuclear complex, along the banks of the Dnipro River, is occupied by Russian forces.Credit...David Guttenfelder for The New York Times

articles.title: Republicans push to see affidavit that justified FBI search of Trump's home
articles.description: Republicans stepped up calls on Sunday for the release of an FBI affidavit showing the justification for its seizure of documents at former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago home amid reports of heightened threats against federal law enforcement personnel.

articles.title: 1 person is dead and 17 injured after a car drove through a crowd at a Pennsylvania community event
